## Requirement Reference
- **Requirement ID:** FR#LUR-9
- **Source Document:** Requirement/Functional/V1/2#LookupReterival/FR#LUR-9 - Get Applicable Level Details.md

## Description
System should allow retrieval of applicable level details.

## Request/Response
- **Request:** ApplicableLevelID (guid)
- **Response:** ApplicableLevelID, Name, DisplayName

## User Roles

- Practice Admin
- Tech Team Panel Member
- TA Team Admin
